Wishing you and your family a safe, healthy, and blessed #Thanksgiving. 

This #holidayseason let us show our appreciation for those we love and our local communities by remembering and upholding our #COVID safety measures.

#COVID19 is increasing significantly across the US. This #Thanksgiving2020 keep any gatherings small, wear masks, wash your hands, and stay at least 6 feet apart. Postponing travel and staying home is the best way to protect yourself and others this year. ü¶Éüò∑
